verses.verse: Better <S%H2896><s%> is the poor <S%H7326><s%> that walks <S%H1980><s%> in his integrity, <S%H8537><s%> than he that is perverse <S%H6141><s%> in his lips, <S%H8193><s%> and is a fool. <S%H3684><s%>

Also, <S%H1571><s%> that the soul <S%H5315><s%> be without <S%H3808><s%> knowledge, <S%H1847><s%> it is not good; <S%H2896><s%> and he that hastens <S%H213><s%> with his feet <S%H7272><s%> sins. <S%H2398><s%>
The foolishness <S%H200><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> perverts <S%H5557><s%> his way: <S%H1870><s%> and his heart <S%H3820><s%> frets <S%H2196><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Wealth <S%H1952><s%> makes many <S%H7227><s%> friends; <S%H7453><s%> but the poor <S%H1800><s%> is separated <S%H6504><s%> from his neighbor. <S%H7453><s%>
A false <S%H8267><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> shall not be unpunished, <S%H5352><s%> and he that speaks <S%H6315><s%> lies <S%H3576><s%> shall not escape. <S%H4422><s%>
Many <S%H7227><s%> will entreat <S%H2470><s%> the favor <S%H6440><s%> of the prince: <S%H5081><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> man is a friend <S%H7453><s%> to him that gives gifts. <S%H4976><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the brothers <S%H251><s%> of the poor <S%H7326><s%> do hate <S%H8130><s%> him: how <S%H637><s%> much <S%H637><s%> more do his friends <S%H4828><s%> go <S%H7368><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from him? he pursues <S%H7291><s%> them with words, <S%H561><s%> yet they are wanting <S%H3808><s%> to him.
He that gets <S%H7069><s%> wisdom <S%H3820><s%> loves <S%H157><s%> his own soul: <S%H5315><s%> he that keeps <S%H8104><s%> understanding <S%H8394><s%> shall find <S%H4672><s%> good. <S%H2896><s%>
A false <S%H8267><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> shall not be unpunished, <S%H5352><s%> and he that speaks <S%H6315><s%> lies <S%H3576><s%> shall perish. <S%H6><s%>
Delight <S%H8588><s%> is not seemly <S%H5000><s%> for a fool; <S%H3684><s%> much <S%H637><s%> less for a servant <S%H5650><s%> to have rule <S%H4910><s%> over princes. <S%H8269><s%>

The discretion <S%H7922><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%> defers <S%H748><s%> his anger; <S%H639><s%> and it is his glory <S%H8597><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> a transgression. <S%H6588><s%>
The king's <S%H4428><s%> wrath <S%H2197><s%> is as the roaring <S%H5099><s%> of a lion; <S%H3715><s%> but his favor <S%H7522><s%> is as dew <S%H2919><s%> on the grass. <S%H6212><s%>

A foolish <S%H3684><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> is the calamity <S%H1942><s%> of his father: <S%H1><s%> and the contentions <S%H4079><s%> of a wife <S%H802><s%> are a continual <S%H2956><s%> dropping. <S%H1812><s%>
House <S%H1004><s%> and riches <S%H1952><s%> are the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of fathers: <S%H1><s%> and a prudent <S%H7919><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> is from the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Slothfulness <S%H6103><s%> casts <S%H5307><s%> into a deep <S%H8639><s%> sleep; <S%H3462><s%> and an idle <S%H7423><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> shall suffer hunger. <S%H7456><s%>
He that keeps <S%H8104><s%> the commandment <S%H4687><s%> keeps <S%H8104><s%> his own soul; <S%H5315><s%> but he that despises <S%H959><s%> his ways <S%H1870><s%> shall die. <S%H4191><s%>
He that has pity <S%H2603><s%> on the poor <S%H1800><s%> lends <S%H3867><s%> to the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and that which he has given <S%H1576><s%> will he pay <S%H7999><s%> him again. <S%H7999><s%>
Chasten <S%H3256><s%> your son <S%H1121><s%> while <S%H3588><s%> there is hope, <S%H8615><s%> and let not your soul <S%H5315><s%> spare <S%H5375><s%> for his crying. <S%H4191><s%>
A man of great wrath <S%H2534><s%> shall suffer <S%H5375><s%> punishment: <S%H6066><s%> for if <S%H518><s%> you deliver <S%H5337><s%> him, yet <S%H5750><s%> you must do it again. <S%H3254><s%>
Hear <S%H8085><s%> counsel, <S%H6098><s%> and receive <S%H6901><s%> instruction, <S%H4148><s%> that you may be wise <S%H2449><s%> in your latter <S%H319><s%> end.
There are many <S%H7227><s%> devices <S%H4284><s%> in a man's <S%H376><s%> heart; <S%H3820><s%> nevertheless the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that shall stand. <S%H6965><s%>
The desire <S%H8378><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%> is his kindness: <S%H2617><s%> and a poor <S%H7326><s%> man is better <S%H2896><s%> than a liar. <S%H376><s%> <S%H3576><s%>

The fear <S%H3374><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> tends to life: <S%H2416><s%> and he that has it shall abide <S%H3885><s%> satisfied; <S%H7649><s%> he shall not be visited <S%H6485><s%> with evil. <S%H7451><s%>

A slothful <S%H6102><s%> man hides <S%H2934><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> in his bosom, <S%H6747><s%> and will not so much <S%H1571><s%> as bring <S%H7725><s%> it to his mouth <S%H6310><s%> again. <S%H7725><s%>

Smite <S%H5221><s%> a scorner, <S%H3887><s%> and the simple <S%H6612><s%> will beware: <S%H6191><s%> and reprove <S%H3198><s%> one that has understanding, <S%H995><s%> and he will understand <S%H995><s%> knowledge. <S%H1847><s%>

He that wastes <S%H7703><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> and chases <S%H1272><s%> away his mother, <S%H517><s%> is a son <S%H1121><s%> that causes shame, <S%H954><s%> and brings <S%H2659><s%> reproach. <S%H2659><s%>
Cease, <S%H2308><s%> my son, <S%H1121><s%> to hear <S%H8085><s%> the instruction <S%H4148><s%> that causes to err <S%H7686><s%> from the words <S%H561><s%> of knowledge. <S%H1847><s%>
An ungodly <S%H1100><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> scorns <S%H3887><s%> judgment: <S%H4941><s%> and the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> devours <S%H1104><s%> iniquity. <S%H205><s%>
Judgments <S%H8201><s%> are prepared <S%H3559><s%> for scorners, <S%H3887><s%> and stripes <S%H4112><s%> for the back <S%H1458><s%> of fools. <S%H3684><s%>
